title: Week 5 - Drink More Water and Reduce Liquid Calories

items.text:
Continue with your experiment from the previous week. If it’s been going well then increase the difficulty slightly eg raise your ‘water goal’.
If you’ve found it difficult then scale it back slightly. Remember the goal is to get regular practice.
If you’d like to change Experiment then you can.

items.title: Experiments

defaultHabit.title: Drink Water and Reduce Liquid Calories

items: Set a water goal for the day - mark it on your bottle
Have water first thing in the morning
Drink a glass of water before eating
Have water instead of other liquids
Have hot drinks instead of juice/soft drinks
